name: @sudosos/sudosos-client
description: Frontend client for the SudoSOS barsystem

scripts.genbuild:main: npm run gen:main && npm run build && (git add ./src && git add ./dist)
scripts.update-swagger:main: (cd ./node_modules/@sudosos/sudosos-backend-main && npx npm install && npx npm run swagger ) && cp ./node_modules/@sudosos/sudosos-backend/out/swagger.json ./swagger-main.json
scripts.genupdate:main: npm run update-swagger:main && npm run genbuild:main
scripts.genbuild:dev: npm run gen:dev && npm run build && (git add ./src && git add ./dist)
scripts.genupdate:dev: npm run update-swagger:dev && npm run genbuild:dev
scripts.update-swagger:dev: (cd ./node_modules/@sudosos/sudosos-backend-develop && npx npm install && npx npm run swagger ) && cp ./node_modules/@sudosos/sudosos-backend/out/swagger.json ./swagger-develop.json

author: SudoSOS WG
